short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The small extension that helps you to monitor prices on Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sell your products for the best price on the best EU Amazon Marketplace

Increase your sales by keeping on top of pricing and making the most of price differences between these marketplaces -

Amazon.CO.UK
Amazon.DE
Amazon.FR
Amazon.ES
Amazon.IT

Instantly access the product price in both Euros and Pounds as well as the sales rank in each marketplace without having to manually open a new tab for each. Use the quick links to jump to the product listing pages in each of the EU marketplaces if you want to dive a little deeper.

You'll also find handy links to look up each product in each marketplace on Keepa.com and CamelCamelCamel. You'll also be able to search for the product on eBay or Google with the click of a button.

Euro Helper has been build for UK sellers who want to save time when selling into Europe.

This tool will also make is easy to spot arbitrage opportunities where you can buy on Amazon France and sell on Amazon UK (or the other way around, for instance)

With Euro Helper, you'll be able to make better purchasing decisions and get a better return from your existing inventory. You'll be winning the buy box more often in Europe and will save the headache of manually navigating between the listings for each country.
